name: French Conjugation
description: Thanks to this application you can  * Access offline to 3000 most used verbs * Access online more than 20.000 verbs * Conjugate a verb in all tenses, in all modes and all forms (negative, interrogative, reflexive, ...) * Find the exact conjugation from a verb * Test your knowledge of the conjugation of a verb * Find synonyms and antonyms of verbs * Listen to the pronunciation of a verb * Consult a list of common verbs * Find similar verb conjugations  Our engine conjugator also permits  * An alphabetical list of verbs
